languages.text: "Мой род, уважаемая Ториана, еще ни в чем не был уличен. Решение об их виновности вынесет Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: "Мой род, уважаемая Ториана, еще ни в чем не был уличен. Решение о их виновности вынесет Вольный Торговец". {n}Несмотря на то, что Абеляр говорит без вокс-устройства, его ответ Ториане звучит не менее безразлично, чем ее механический голос.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "My family, Lady Toriana, is yet to be found guilty of anything. That verdict is for the Rogue Trader to reach."
languages.original_text: "Мой род, уважаемая Ториана, еще ни в чем не был уличен. Решение об их виновности вынесет Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: "My family, dear Toriana, is not yet found guilty of anything. That verdict is for the Rogue Trader to reach."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My family, dear Toriana, is not yet found guilty of anything. That verdict is for the Rogue Trader to reach."

traits.locale_text: "My family, Lady Toriana, is yet to be found guilty of anything. That verdict is for the Rogue Trader to reach."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「敬愛するトリアーナよ、わが一族はまだ有罪と決まってはおりません。その評決を出すのは自由開拓者です」
languages.original_text: "My family, Lady Toriana, is yet to be found guilty of anything. That verdict is for the Rogue Trader to reach."

traits.locale_text: 「敬愛するトリアーナよ、わが一族はまだ有罪と決まってはおりません。その評決を出すのは自由開拓者です」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “托丽安娜女士，我的家族尚未被定罪。一切还要等待行商浪人的最终判决。”
languages.original_text: "My family, Lady Toriana, is yet to be found guilty of anything. That verdict is for the Rogue Trader to reach."

traits.locale_text: “尊敬的托丽安娜，我的家族尚未被定罪。一切还要等待行商浪人的最终判决。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Ma famille, dame Toriana, n'a pas encore été déclarée coupable de quoi que ce soit. Cette prérogative revient {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "My family, Lady Toriana, is yet to be found guilty of anything. That verdict is for the Rogue Trader to reach."

traits.locale_text: « Ma famille, chère Toriana, n'a pas encore été déclarée coupable de quoi que ce soit. Cette prérogative revient {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Mi familia, lady Toriana, aún no ha sido declarada culpable de nada. Ese veredicto lo dictará {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "My family, Lady Toriana, is yet to be found guilty of anything. That verdict is for the Rogue Trader to reach."

traits.locale_text: «Mi familia, querida Toriana, aún no ha sido declarada culpable de nada. Ese veredicto lo dictará {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Meine Familie, werte Lady Toriana, wurde noch keines Verbrechens für schuldig befunden. Dieses Urteil muss {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} fällen."
languages.original_text: "My family, Lady Toriana, is yet to be found guilty of anything. That verdict is for the Rogue Trader to reach."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Familie, werte Toriana, wurde noch keines Verbrechens für schuldig befunden. Dieses Urteil muss {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} fällen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Leydi Toriana, hanemin sözde suçları işlediği henüz kanıtlanmış değil. Bu kararı ancak Hür Tacir verecektir."
languages.original_text: "My family, Lady Toriana, is yet to be found guilty of anything. That verdict is for the Rogue Trader to reach."

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Toriana, hanemin sözde suçları işlediği henüz kanıtlanmış değil. Bu kararı ancak Hür Tacir verecektir."
